translations: n.书目；参考文献（bibliography 的复数）

sentences.sentence: The paperback appendix of this pamphlet lists all its bibliographies.
sentences.translation: 这个简装小册子的附录列出了该书的参考书目。

sentences.sentence: All of the articles are signed and have bibliographies, some extensive.
sentences.translation: 所有的文章都签署和参考书目，有广泛的。

sentences.sentence: This book has good indexes to selected bibliographies and organizations.
sentences.translation: 这本书有好的索引选择叁考书目和组织。
